description:
The son of Rudolf and his previous wife, Asumu. Six years ago, he rebelled against his father who had entered his second wife in the very time he was bereaved of his mother. He went to live with his maternal grandparents. However, his grandparents died one after the other, and six years later, he has returned to the Ushiromiya family.
He is very stubborn and is afraid of "shaky" transportation, thinking he might fall off. He insists that the Golden Witch does not exist, and his denial of her existence becomes the main theme of the game.
name: Ushiromiya Battler
